bio: Lily has been training and teaching yoga for the past four years. She is a certified Yoga Instructor RYT 200 from CorePower Yoga. Lily has traveled the world, teaching at the top rated yoga studios. She is a great asset to the company.

Sami was a professional dancer for over 10 years. She has a concentration in ballet, jazz, tap, alternative, hip hop and more! She has worked with a wide variety of clients and is a great asset to BodyWorks.

Bryant is the founder of BodyWorks. He has been working as a Personal Trainer in Brooklyn since 2013. Being never particularly good at sport when he was at school, Byrant found that he actually just really enjoyed fitness, and through that fell into the fitness industry after gaining his BA from the University of New York.
